summary: This is an email from Johanna Rae Hudgens to Suzanne Jaffe Bloom and Cristina I. Calvar, with a subject line referencing 'Illeilloomentexpespa'. The email contains a confidentiality notice and a tax advice disclaimer, and is part of the Epstein case document set.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 4, 2019, from Johanna Rae Hudgens to Suzanne Jaffe Bloom and Cristina I. Calvar.
The email contains a confidentiality notice stating its contents may be privileged and should not be disseminated without permission.
The email includes a tax advice disclaimer stating any tax advice cannot be used to avoid penalties under tax laws.
The subject line contains the term 'Illeilloomentexpespa', which appears garbled or coded.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting the correspondence may be relevant to the investigation.
